languages.text: "Мы должны не драться, а вместе остановить наступающий кошмар".
"Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."
languages.original_text: "Мы должны не драться, а вместе остановить наступающий кошмар".

traits.locale_text: "Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to stop the coming nightmare."
"Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to stop the coming nightmare."
"Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."
"Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."
"Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."
"Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."

languages.text: « Au lieu de nous battre, nous devrions unir nos forces pour empêcher le cauchemar imminent. »
languages.original_text: "Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."

traits.locale_text: « Au lieu de nous battre, nous devrions unir nos forces pour empêcher le cauchemar imminent. »

languages.text: «En lugar de tanto pelearnos, deberíamos unirnos para detener esta pesadilla».
languages.original_text: "Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."

traits.locale_text: «En lugar de tanto pelearnos, deberíamos unirnos para detener esta pesadilla».

languages.text: “我们不该继续争斗了，应该联合起来，阻止即将到来的噩梦。”
languages.original_text: "Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."

traits.locale_text: “我们不该继续争斗了，应该联合起来，阻止即将到来的噩梦。”

languages.text: 「互いに争い合うのではなく、団結して差し迫った悪夢を食い止めるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."

traits.locale_text: 「互いに争い合うのではなく、団結して差し迫った悪夢を食い止めるのだ」

languages.text: "Statt einander zu bekämpfen, sollten wir uns zusammenschließen, um den drohenden Albtraum aufzuhalten."
languages.original_text: "Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."

traits.locale_text: "Statt einander zu bekämpfen, sollten wir uns zusammenschließen, um den drohenden Albtraum aufzuhalten."

languages.text: "Birbirimizle tartışmak yerine yaklaşan kâbusu durdurmak için birlik olmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "Instead of fighting each other, we should unite to halt the impending nightmare."
